description: Marine Headquarters, the main base of the Marines located in Paradise on the Grand Line. The site of the Summit War between the Marines and Whitebeard Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Whitebeard's Earthquake Tilts the Island
keyEvents.description: Whitebeard unleashes a catastrophic earthquake so massive that the entire island of Marineford tilts to one side.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the physical vulnerability of even Marine Headquarters to Whitebeard's power.

keyEvents.title: Encircling Walls Activated
keyEvents.description: The Marines activate massive retaining walls designed to trap all pirate forces in the bay area.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals a major strategic defense mechanism at Marine Headquarters.

keyEvents.title: Akainu's Meteor Volcano Melts the Ice
keyEvents.description: Akainu's devastating Meteor Volcano attack rains down on Marineford, melting the ice battlefield.
keyEvents.significance: Dramatically alters the physical geography and tactical situation of the battle.

statusHistory.reason: Severely damaged by Whitebeard's earthquakes and the war
